description: Well known rigger and BDSM player Sir C comes to Waterbondage to tie up and torture Vendetta, one of our favorite subs. The shoot focuses on dunking and water-play, and features the return of one of the large tanks that you have been asking for. Sir C handles Vendetta masterfully, and watching her gasp for air between dunks is truly something to behold.
title: Vendetta and Sir C
